main.window

Class ConfigureCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • main.window.ConfigureCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ConfigureCard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class provide graphical interface to configure the security system. User can activate or deactivate sensors in all or selected area of the house map.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
